name: Connect LearnDash to Discord
author: ExpressTech Softwares Solutions Pvt Ltd

sections.description:
This add-on enables connecting your LearnDash-enabled website to your discord server. With this plugin, you can create a discord community of your students and assign them discord roles in the server according to the course they are learning.
private access to course content plus discord’s ability to add fun and creativity in community engagement will help create a thriving community, discord is safe and designed to help fight spam and promote healthy community discussions.
This plugin promotes Engagement, Upsell and cross-sell opportunities, Advocacy, and referrals that ultimately help increase revenues.

Very simple setup and intutive User interface to Manage Student Role inside Discord.
– Please always contact support if you are facing issues in setup or see any bug.
– If you did like the plugin, kindly support us in doing free excellent work our PayPal email is: business@expresstechsoftwares.com

Connect LearnDash to Discord Plugin Features:
1) Allow any student to connect their discord account with their LearnDash website account.

2) Shortcode [learndash_discord] to display connect/disconnect button.

3) Mapping of courses and discord roles.

4) Send custom welcome message when student joins the server.

5) Send custom message when student completes a course.

6) Send custom message when student completes a lesson.

7) Send custom message when student completes a topic.

8) Send custom message when student completes a quiz.

9) Send custom message when assignment is approved.

  13. connect GamiPress and Discord
  14. Connect Tutor LMS to Discord
sections.installation:
Download, Install and Activate!

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New to find and install connect learndash discord Addon.
  2. Or, download the latest version of the plugin, then go to Plugins > Add New and click the “Upload Plugin” button to upload your .zip file.
  3. Activate the plugin.
sections.faq:
I’m getting an error in error Log ‘Missing Access’

Please make sure your bot role has the high priority among all other roles your bot has to manager in your discord server roles settings.

Role Settings is not appearing.

  1. Clear browser cache, to uninstall and install again.
  2. Try the disabling cache
  3. Try Disabling other plugins, there may be any conflict with another plugin.

Members are not being added spontaneously.

  1. Due to the nature of Discord API, we have to use schedules to precisely control API calls, This is the reason actions are delayed.

Member roles are not being assigned spontaneously.

  1. Due to the nature of Discord API, we have to use schedules to precisely control API calls, This is the reason actions are delayed.

Some members are not getting their role and there is no error in the log.

  1. Sometimes discord API behaves weirdly, It is suggested to TRY again OR use another discord account.
sections.screenshots:
1. Install and activate the plugin and view the "Discord Settings" menu inside LearnDash LMS.

  2. Map Discord roles and LearnDash Course.

  3. Advanced settings.

  4. Connect Button Appearance.

  5. Spot the "Connect to Discord" on Learners profile page.
sections.reviews:
Cool plugin

By jozsefprofithu on January 23, 2023

Everything works fine with this plugin, it connected to the discord and handle the roles perfectly..

Perfect plugin for community features !

By keucha on December 17, 2022

I was looking for a way to use Discord as part of my courses, for the community features. I wanted to keep the control of what my students from different courses can see in my Discord server. It's possible to do it manually, but you have hundreds of students...

This plugin does a perfect job mapping the role you create in your server (like tags) and your courses in LearnDash... Students in course A can only see what I want them to see in my Discord server. And Students from course B see different parts. And when you want, they all can see common parts of your Discord.

Amazing plugin !

PS: Ravi is very helpful to set up the plugin correctly !

Nice Plugin, amazing support team

By puromc on October 4, 2022

Ravi has been super helpful with everything. And the plugin works perfectly. We solved the manual labor of adding every customer to the server. Thanks!

Works great!!

By farfan11 on September 3, 2022

I have been recently testing this plugin inside my paid online Learndash course. I received assistance from Ravi and the team when setting up the plugin for the first time. It was great to know the team is actively working on fixing and updating this plugin. This ensured the trust I needed to keep this plugin active for the long-term! The plugin does exactly what it should! You can allow students to join your private discord community by the click of a button. It integrates well with WordPress and learndash by giving you the ability to insert a short code on any page. I look forward to future updates and features to make this my go to community plugin for my learndash courses!
